DOC.criteria: Scheduled undergo cardiac surgery . Inclusion criterion : age great equal 75 year present cardiac surgery Mayo Clinic Rochester , Minnesota ; schedule undergo complex cardiac surgery . Complex cardiac surgery define surgery involve one heart valve , redosternotomy procedure , combine valvular CABG procedure . Exclusion criterion include : left right ventricular assist device implantation explantation , procedure require cardiopulmonary bypass , active infection sepsis , severe hepatic disease ascites , preoperative renal dysfunction include baseline creatinine equal great 1.5 mg/dL require dialysis , immunosuppressive medication use ( include steroid use ) , immunodeficiency syndrome , know neurologic psychiatric disorder , use drug psychosis .
